item.title: Pi Day is on July 22nd
item.description:
Pi Day is observed twice a year. The date March 14 (3/14) reflects the constant’s value. It’s also celebrated on July 22, referencing the common fractional representation of Pi, 22/7. To mark the occasion, Parallels has designed an infographic with fascinating information about Pi and suggestions for celebrating...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/pi-day-is-on-july-22nd/
